question: Sundar Singh Gurjar, who recently won the gold medal in menâ€™s F46 javelin throw at World Para Athletics Championships 2019 belongs to which Indian state?
explanation: Sundar Singh Gurjar is an Indian Paralympic javelin thrower, shot putter and discus thrower competing in F46 events. He has won India\'s second gold defending his World Para Athletics Championships title in the men\'s F46 javelin throw event in Dubai. He is from Jaipur, Rajasthan. With this, India has secured three Tokyo Paralympic Games quota, along with the bronze winner Ajeet Singh and Rinku.
